com.unibet.worktest.bank

Interface TransferService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransferServiceImpl

    @Sealed
public interface TransferService
    Defines the business logic for performing monetary transactions between accounts.
    Author:
    Unibet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<com.unibet.worktest.bank.Transaction> findTransactions(java.lang.String accountRef)
      Finds all monetary transactions performed towards a given account.
      com.unibet.worktest.bank.Transaction getTransaction(java.lang.String transactionRef)
      Get a given transaction by reference.
      void transferFunds(com.unibet.worktest.bank.TransferRequest transferRequest)
      Executes a balanced, multi-legged monetary transaction as a single unit of work.

    • Method Detail

      • transferFunds

        void transferFunds(com.unibet.worktest.bank.TransferRequest transferRequest)
        Executes a balanced, multi-legged monetary transaction as a single unit of work.
        Parameters:
        transferRequest - a transfer request describing the transactions
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the request has less than two legs or any other missing or malformed properties
        com.unibet.worktest.bank.AccountNotFoundException - if a referenced account does not exist
        com.unibet.worktest.bank.InsufficientFundsException - if a referenced account is overdrawn
        com.unibet.worktest.bank.UnbalancedLegsException - if the transaction legs are unbalanced (sum is not zero)
        com.unibet.worktest.bank.BusinessException - if there are any other problems transfering funds

      • findTransactions

        java.util.List<com.unibet.worktest.bank.Transaction> findTransactions(java.lang.String accountRef)
        Finds all monetary transactions performed towards a given account.
        Parameters:
        accountRef - the client defined account reference to find transactions for
        Returns:
        list of transactions or an empty list if none is found
        Throws:
        com.unibet.worktest.bank.BusinessException - if there are any problems retrieving the transactions

      • getTransaction

        com.unibet.worktest.bank.Transaction getTransaction(java.lang.String transactionRef)
        Get a given transaction by reference.
        Parameters:
        transactionRef - the transaction reference
        Returns:
        the transaction or null if it doesnt exist
        Throws:
        com.unibet.worktest.bank.BusinessException - if there are any problems retrieving the transaction
